alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:11AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Suffolk County through 800 AM EDT... At 710 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Huntington Station to near Robert Moses State Park to 21 miles south of Jones Beach. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain and winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brentwood and Huntington Station around 715 AM EDT. Commack and Northport around 720 AM EDT. Hauppauge around 725 AM EDT. Islip and Smithtown around 730 AM EDT. Centereach and Stony Brook around 745 AM EDT. Ronkonkoma and Sayville around 750 AM EDT. Port Jefferson and Holbrook around 755 AM EDT. Shirley and Medford around 800 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
